reviews.review: When the free to play and the battle royal came, I thought,"this is dumb!" However, I realize this made the game stronger
cool game have played for 2 almost 3 years now.
Very good game i enjoy playing it with friends a lot but the time it takes for cheaters to get banned is just to long honestly other than that i dont have any problems with the game :) 9/10 game
Great game but don't like cheaters.. i know valve is working on it but hopefully they find em all and ban em!
It`s a good game, the best !!

Since this game went free, people don't give a damm if they get banned for cheating. It's very easy to install wall hacks and aim bots and if you get ban just make a new steam account. The anti-cheating systems are overwhelmed and can't keep the game clean. In the last 30 matches I've noticed suspicious gameplay from other players, upon watching the game replay (a big waste of time because you can't even speed it up) on each of them I found cheating players. I individually reported each of them with the recording of their behavior and none even got banned. It used to be fun before it was free but now I don't recommend it.

Depois de poucas horas jogadas eu percebi que o jogo é repetitivo e muitas vezes injusto por causa que você fica na equipe contra os players bons e focados enquanto seu time é uma batata. Por tanto amei o jogo mas n recomendo.

Es el juego de mi preadolescencia. Volvimos a jugarlo con mis amigos despues de 15 años. Lo disfrutamos aún más que cuando éramos sólo unos niños. Es simplemente pura emoción.
